mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboard (title, writer, content, email) VALUES (#{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, writer, email, content, created_at AS createdAt, deleted_at AS deletedAt, views FROM freeboard WHERE deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{start}
